abstract: Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg’s legal woes are apparently not over, despite reportedly nearing a settlement with three former classmates, who have accused Mr. Zuckerberg and the original crew behind Facebook of pilfering their profitable idea.
lead_paragraph: Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg’s legal woes are apparently not over, despite reportedly nearing a settlement with three former classmates, who have accused Mr. Zuckerberg and the original crew behind Facebook of pilfering their profitable idea.
